rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with wheelchair accessible ramp and automatic sliding doors to ensure ease of access. Provides a welcoming first impression while aligning with Vastu principles for entry.

rooms.name: Garage Area
rooms.description: Two-car garage area designed to accommodate two vehicles and storage space; includes automated doors and wheelchair accessible pathways.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living room with ample natural lighting, equipped with a retractable projector screen and smart home control panel. Designed to create a relaxing ambiance in accordance with Chettinad architectural aesthetics.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, this dining space features an extended counter for accessibility and a semi-open design connecting to the kitchen area. Vastu compliant layout to invite positive energy.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The main entrance is designed for ease of access and security, featuring wheelchair accessibility in compliance with local building norms.

openings.name: Garage Entry
openings.description: Provides smooth entry for vehicles while maintaining aesthetic integrity; equipped with safety sensors.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Ensures natural light and ventilation to the living areas, designed in Chettinad style with decorative glass panels.
